name: Street Warrior Robot NY
description:
Street Warrior Robot NY is all set with a twist of real fighter Ninja bot fighting. Great opportunity for Taekwondo kung fu city fighter to exhibit their martial arts hadoken and other punch Boxing skills. Discover multi arcade abilities of mech steel robot fighting and train it to true world champion streatfighter.
Features:
Incredible Punches, kicks, Boxing Fight
Execute city fighter max steal attacks
Fighting Robot warrior enemies streatfighter
Amazing Kung fu fight Wrestling training
Ultra steel Robot boxing champion war
Ultimate 3D kungfu Bot fighting game
